meanings.definition: Cause (someone or something) to come to a place.
meanings.sent1: Mom brings me to school every morning.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the bell brings the students to the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The magic carpet brings me to school faster than a rocket!
meanings.sent4: Her smile brings sunshine to my cloudy days.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh cookies brings back memories of childhood.

meanings.definition: Make (someone or something) appear or occur.
meanings.sent1: Turning on the light brings brightness to the room.
meanings.sent2: The magician brings a rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain brings a rainbow to the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter brings joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise brings a new day full of possibilities.

meanings.definition: Carry or accompany to a place.
meanings.sent1: The strong wind brings leaves from the trees to the ground.
meanings.sent2: The river brings nutrients to the soil as it flows.
meanings.sent3: The friendly dog brings his favorite toy to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: The stork brings babies to their new families.
meanings.sent5: The delivery truck brings packages to our doorstep.

meanings.sent2: Eating healthy food brings energy to the body.
meanings.sent3: The special potion brings magical powers to the wizard.
meanings.sent4: Kindness brings warmth to the heart.
meanings.sent5: Practice brings improvement in any skill.
